alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:48AM MST until March 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 944 AM MST, gauge reports indicated increased streamflow. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Hassayampa River This replaces the previous warning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wickenburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
